mapper.select: select count(*) from psp_check_task task left join qz_iesb_for_ecif ecif on task.cus_id = ecif.client_no where 1 = 1 and task.approve_status='0' and ecif.user_Id=#{userId}

select count(*) from psp_check_task task inner join qz_iesb_for_ecif ecif on task.cus_id = ecif.client_no where 1 = 1 and task.approve_status='0' and trunc(sysdate-to_date(task.TASK_CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')) > 10
